mean_en: a substance that is the main part of the cell walls of plants and that is used in making various products (such as paper)
word_etyma: cellul=cell细胞  + ose...的 → 纤维素；（植物的）细胞膜质
short_phrase: Toilet paper is made out of cellulose.
sentence: Toilet paper is made from cellulose.
sentence_trans: 厕所纸是用纤维制造而成。
